## LimitedRowSelectorComponent.selectItem() method

Adds item to selection (or remove it from selection if deselect is true)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
selectItem(item: TData, select?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  item | <code>TData</code> | Item that is going to be selected |
|  select | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether select specified item, defaults to true |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
